title: high latency
body:
I live in Indiana and I usually get 20-30 ms but recently I have been getting 120ms.  So I decided to do a trace route and for some reason the 10th hop is going to England does anyone know why this would be happening?

trace route: https://i.imgur.com/NS9M34r.png

edit: for what ever reason the problem is now fixed

replies.body: I know this is 5 hours old, however he is not the only one having Latency issues, i was as well, could be a similar problem as the ISP doing something wrong however, i play on the NA server and it was happening about 4P.M. EST so yeah.
Huh....yea that's not normal. Looks like your ISP was doing some pretty weird stuff to have sent your connection to England and back, but I'm glad it's straightened out now!
